area.key: Save and publish to generate reading time
The average number of words per minute a person can read (studies suggest 150-250)
The minimum unit of time to display (e.g. seconds, minutes, hours)
The maximum unit of time to display (e.g. seconds, minutes, hours)
Language specfic properties are not used in this calculation
Hides the warning shown when a content type varies by culture but the data type is invariant
